alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 9:31PM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph...producing significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
